views.name: New entry
views.title: New chore completion entry
views.submit_action_message: Thanks! If you completed another chore, refresh this page to get credit for all your hard work. :)

field_options.name: When did you complete your task?

rows.field_620954: Finished two loads, but I didn't have enough clothes for the third load. I left the clothes in the hamper by the washing machine for the next load.
Jenny was sleeping so I did not vacuum her room and wake her up.
Plenty of dust piled up. Maybe we should make this a more frequent task?
Thanks for leaving me the super oily pans!
The bathtubs should be good for another year!
I put the equipment back in the garage.
Wasn't sure if the soup was still good or not, so I kept it in the fridge.
Some of the shrubs need to be pruned so that I have better access to the outside of the windows.
I successfully changed ALL the filters, even the harder to reach places.

fields.name: Biweekly deadline
fields.formula: if(totext(field('Frequency'))='Biweekly',lookup('Date and tasks','Date of task completion')+ date_interval('14 days'),'')

fields.name: Deadline
fields.formula: todate(totext(field('Biweekly deadline') + field('Monthly deadline')+ field('Weekly deadline') + field('Annual deadline')),'YYYY-MM-DD')

fields.name: Monthly deadline
fields.formula: if(totext(field('Frequency'))='Monthly',lookup('Date and tasks','Date of task completion')+ date_interval('30 days'),'')

fields.name: Annual deadline
fields.formula: if(totext(field('Frequency'))='Annually',lookup('Date and tasks','Date of task completion')+ date_interval('365 days'),'')

views.name: New task
views.title: Add a new task
views.submit_action_message: This task has been added to the list.

field_options.name: Is it a cleaning task or a maintenance task?

rows.field_620944: Collect laundry from all bedrooms and bathrooms. Separate the clothes based on colors. Wash all clothes and dry them. Fold each load.
Go through the fridge and the pantry to identify and throw away food that has already expired.
Vacuum all rooms in the home. Empty vacuum bag in the trash.
Seal the gap between the remaining caulk and the tub to avoid water damage.
Remove all duvets. Wash and dry duvets before replacing.
Dust all the rooms in the home.
Rinse off the dishes, load them in the dishwasher, and start the dishwasher.
Put all dishes from dishwasher back in their place.
Sweep the floor. Prepare soap water to mop. Wipe the baseboards with a wet wash cloth.
Take items out of fridge, wipe down shelves and drawers, and wash the outside of the fridge.
Use the carpet vacuum to wash all rugs, then lay them outside to dry.
Prune the trees and shrubs in the front and backyard.
Take out the trash from the kitchen and all bathrooms. Place new bags in the trash bins.
Throw away the existing litter. Clean the container. Pour new litter in the box.
Wash all windows on the inside and first floor windows from the outside.
Replace all air filters for the vents in the home.
